website_summaries.verdict: Overall, the Nike LeBron Witness II is a performing budget basketball model. The shoe is best for guards who most frequently use the forefoot for their active footwork. The comfortable and appealing upper benefits casual wearers. The minimal cushion setup, lightness, and durability of the shoe can satisfy a wearer’s basketball needs for an entire season.
pros: The diamond traction pattern of the LeBron Witness II may have worked as designed because a good number of wearers leave comments that it grips any court floor well
Most users love the ventilation the textile upper provides
The design of the LeBron Witness II is praised by casual wearers
Wide footers are happy with the fit of the shoe model
Plenty of buyers appreciate the price of this LeBron James’s shoes from Nike
Several mention that the Witness II is a great shoe for outdoor hooping
Many users say the shoe model does not need break-in time
cons: According to a handful of testers, the grooves of the outsole rubber attracts a lot of dust
Some say that the rubber outsole of these Nike performance shoes wears out easily

customer_reviews.title: Tight and uncomfortable around ankles
customer_reviews.text: The shoes looked good and had good width for the toes and were comfortable on the soles, but they were very tight around the ankles and started to hurt soon after wearing them. It also didn't take much to get them to start hurting my ankles, just a bit of walking around my college campus and my ankles had enough. No way I could've actually used these as basketball shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Payton Newsom

customer_reviews.title: They wear out quickly :(
customer_reviews.text: Ankle support during pickle-ball. Too bad I missed the return deadline by 2 days. The shoes started to lose traction after 3 weeks. I'll try something else next time.
customer_reviews.author: P. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Brand New In A BEAUTIFUL Box
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness, I love the box it came in! I was so worried that it wasn't going to come in the original packaging, but it did. The LeBron box for these shoes is so amazing. They were 100% brand spanking new. They came so quickly, and they're going to light up my man's life when he sees these on Christmas day!!!!
customer_reviews.author: LuvBeingMommy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mid-top gum sole shoe
customer_reviews.text: I searched for long time to find a gum sole mid-top shoe to be used for handball. The basketball court shoes have held up much better for me than the traditional racquetball/handball shoe plus I like the way Nike's fit and this shoe was no different. I took it straight out of the box and was able to play in them from day one as really no break-in was required.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey E Swoboda

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe for the money
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for a few months now and like them. They are quite good for the price. My feet feel well in them and not loose at all.
customer_reviews.author: La Reya

customer_reviews.title: My son loves them!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to pick out a pair of shoes for my 10 year old son without asking his opinion. I was a little nervous that he wouldn’t like them but he loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Gazzola

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my husband as he collects shoes, he loves them
customer_reviews.author: Aimi whittaker

customer_reviews.title: Nike
customer_reviews.text: Perfect condition and shoes fit great besides a little tight on sides but should loosen up
customer_reviews.author: Tara Bettlach

customer_reviews.title: They look great, feel ok.
customer_reviews.text: I love them, but my foot is on the wider side. If they had a wide option I would have bought them instead. That said, after a few times on the court, they are feeling better and they look great!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Virtue

customer_reviews.title: Changed the shoe
customer_reviews.text: My son loved these shoes the first time. So I reordered a second pair about a 11/2 years later. They made the back and ankle support very stiff compared to the original.
customer_reviews.author: John Polymath

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the fit and the look. He has been wearing them so they are broken in for basketball. They wear well.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin N.

customer_reviews.title: Just a little narrow
customer_reviews.text: Came and are a little tight. Took longer than expected. That said I got what I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Hasty

customer_reviews.title: Look even better than pictured.
customer_reviews.text: It’s hard to buy a gift for a young man, but my 21 yo son absolutely loves them. They actually look better than pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sneaker (my son says)
customer_reviews.text: My son loved them. We recieved them the day before the promised delivery date.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Capone-Zeno

customer_reviews.title: Supportive, Good Traction, but need to be Broken In
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are a bit snug on my feet even though I ordered my normal size. They definitely require breaking in before using competitively. They are very supportive and seem to have good traction on a basketball court. Overall, a pretty solid shoe for the price.
customer_reviews.author: TJay

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for my grandson and he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent transaction!
customer_reviews.text: My son is wearing these daily and loves them. The sneakers are really good looking too!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: Great Birthday Present
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift. He loves the color and fit.
customer_reviews.author: Seley

customer_reviews.title: Nice pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my nephew and he love them. thanks
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Izquierdo

customer_reviews.title: Order a half size larger.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable. But it fits about a half size small.
customer_reviews.author: james.

customer_reviews.title: Look great though.
customer_reviews.text: They are little tighter that what I thought they should be but will be breaking them in over time. Look great though.
customer_reviews.author: SwingShot

customer_reviews.title: Look great
customer_reviews.text: Shoes look great but run alittle big so id order a 1/2 to full size smaller though
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy  Hall

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe for mid fit. Prefer high tops
customer_reviews.text: I like the overall fit. I use them for basketball.
customer_reviews.author: Freida

product_meta.title: Nike Unisex Adults Zapatillas Lebron Witness Ii White Black Fitness Shoes
product_meta.description:
Nike Men's Lebron Witness II Basketball Shoes

Articulated inner collar provides a comfortable, locked-in feel
Hex-shaped Zoom Air units provide responsive, low-profile cushioning
Decoupled Featherposite zones deliver support with ankle mobility
Forefoot mesh enhances breathability
Durable rubber outsole provides traction
